titleStmt.title: Ayme for Finsburie archers. Or An alphabetical table of the names of euerie marke within the same fields with their true distances both by the map and dimensuration by the line. Published for the ease of the skilfull, and behoofe of the yong beginners in the famous exercise of archerie, by E.B. and I.I.
titleStmt.author: E. B.

titleStmt.title: Ayme for Finsburie archers. Or An alphabetical table of the names of euerie marke within the same fields with their true distances both by the map and dimensuration by the line. Published for the ease of the skilfull, and behoofe of the yong beginners in the famous exercise of archerie, by E.B. and I.I.
titleStmt.author: E. B.
ʻA. ʻA., Duktūr.

publicationStmt.publisher: by R.F. and are to be sold at the signe of the Frier in Grubstreet by F. Sergeant,

notesStmt.note: Final four leaves consist of: "A table of the names of all the markes in Finsburie fieldes".
Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1475-1640 reel 2000 lacks leaf D2.
Reproduction of original in the Pepysian Library, Magdalene College.
